English:

Category: Photography and Design 
Language: Spanish Multilenguaje including 
OS: XP, Vista, 7 
Included Medicine 

Description: 
------------------- 
Many people buy big expensive camcorders but still shoot videos with their mobile phones or cameras for snapshots. 
With photo editing software goes something like this you have powerful graphics editors, but most of the time only used a couple of functions. Ashampoo Photo Optimizer allows you to quickly touch up your digital photos. Everything is so simple you do not need to read the manual after you point and shoot just click and forward 

Features 

Instant Optimize Function 
I love when he fought with all the complicated settings of a graphic editor. Simply select a photo and click Optimize. Suddenly a dull photo starts to shine. Not have to configure anything, just point and click. The results look attractive and natural, not artificial. You can also optimize all your photos with a simple click, as easy as making a single photo. 

Red eye correction 
The correction of the hideous red eye effect in flash is really easy. Just select the photo that contains the red eyes and click, Photo Optimizer does the rest. No need to make a precise selection, the red area is found and corrected automatically. Again, the result looks natural and attractive and get it instantly, without having to spend hours studying a manual. 

Rotation, brightness, contrast and effects 
Click once to rotate the pictures by either side. Adjust the brightness and contrast with simple sliders. Turn your photos into black and white or sepia or invert the colors, all with a simple click. Instant preview, instant results and simply click on Undo if you change your thinking. 

Auto Restoration - undo changes at any time 
Do not worry about the "damage" that can make your photos to edit and you can always return to the original version. Ashampoo Photo Optimizer makes automatic safeguards the original versions of their photos on a database. To restore the original simply select the photo and click Undo - even days or weeks later. In the new version can also choose where to save the database Undo. 

Image viewer, Windows Explorer integration 
Ashampoo Photo Optimizer also behaves as a fast picture viewer showing an Explorer-style directory that lists all the drives and folders on your PC for easy access. It also works with digital cameras, showing pictures of the camera is connected to the PC. In Windows Explorer you can click the right mouse button on any picture to load Photo Optimizer instantly. 

Features 
* Instant Optimize function to polish off Photos 
Optimize all the photos with a single click 
* Select and click red eye removal 
* One click to rotate an image 
Convert to black and white, sepia or invert colors 
* Buff with ease and use sliders for contrast 
* Automatic restoration: any time you can undo changes 
* Vista Explorer to display images quickly 
* Boot from Windows Explorer with the right mouse button
